game.name: 文字生存守则
game.genres: Adventure, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Amid info nodes, you’re a codebreaker—each choice shifts the story. Click nodes for clues, pull key details from text, crack codes, link logic. When all light up, truth emerges: unravel with reason, or get stuck in a thought labyrinth? It depends on your calls.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Amid info nodes, you’re a codebreaker—each choice shifts the story. Click nodes for clues, pull key details from text, crack codes, link logic. When all light up, truth emerges: unravel with reason, or get stuck in a thought labyrinth? It depends on your calls.
